reviewText:
C3 is as the others described but with a whole lot more to it. Perhaps at a later date I can add more but it is necessary at this time to inform possible customers the version pictured is available elsewhere for $18 with free shipping; I'd hate to see a fellow anime lover get ripped by paying what this dude is demanding.
It is a well done and delightful series.

I really liked this show the first time I saw it. As soon as I  finished the last episode I looked it up on Amazon and found this but it was unavailable. I am also waiting for the third season this show came out 3 years ago so it doesn't look like there will be a third season. So I would appreciate it if amazon could get some more of these in stock.
